title: VibeUniv | Learn Your Code by Building with AI
description: Built an app with Cursor or Claude Code but don't understand the code? Connect your project and AI analyzes your tech stack, turning your actual code into a personalized learning roadmap. Free to start in 5 minutes.

og.title: You're halfway there. Complete the other half here. | VibeUniv
og.description: Built an app with AI coding tools? Now it's time to truly understand your code. Connect your project — AI analyzes your tech stack and creates a 1:1 personalized learning experience using your own code.

og.imageSubtitle: A personalized learning platform for AI-built apps

twitter.title: Built an app with AI? Learn from your own code | VibeUniv
